title: AWS CloudOps hones multi-cloud support for AI, resilience
description: Network, observability and Kubernetes management news at re:Invent aligned around themes of multi-cloud scale and resilience amid AI growth and cloud outage concerns.
content: AWS rolled out a series of updates to its cloud operations services this week, all tailored to making multi-cloud and multi-environment infrastructure easier to manage as enterprises prepare for AI.… [+11755 chars]
